name: Aposyntheto's Apology
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
Requirements Youâ€™re aware of the attack, are not flat-footed against it, and a hand covered by Aposyntheto's form is free.
Trigger You are the target of single-target ranged attack.
-
Aposyntheto instinctively moves your entire right arm in an attempt to divert the projectile's direction away from you.
Effect Spend 2 Shard Points for every relic level Aposyntheto has. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. You cannot use this feat to deflect unusually massive ranged projectiles (such as boulders or ballista bolts). If the attack were to be successful only because of a fortune effect on the attack roll, you automatically raise Aposyntheto's Shard Point value by the same amount you spent on this use of *Aposyntheto's Apology*.
